translations: 男皮条客；<澳新，非正式>告发者，告密者
拉皮条；<非正式>使（某物）更炫（或更令人难忘）；<非正式>盛大（或持续）推售（某事物）；<澳新，非正式>告发，告密（pimp on）

sentences.sentence: He stole, lied, deceived, and pimped his way out of poverty.
sentences.translation: 他靠偷窃、行骗、欺诈和拉皮条摆脱了贫穷。

sentences.sentence: Jack Brun Don't go in the pimped out fridge Jack...
sentences.translation: 杰克·布鲁诺：“别再把东西放到冰箱外面了，杰克……”。

sentences.sentence: Jack Bruno: Don't go in the pimped out fridge Jack...
